# 3D Plotting Tests

## Simple 3D Surface

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 900
#| plot_height: 700
#| fig-cap: "3D plot of sin(x)cos(y)"
#| label: fig-sincos
plot3d(sin(x)*cos(y), [x, -2*%pi, 2*%pi], [y, -2*%pi, 2*%pi]);
```

## Paraboloid

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 900
#| plot_height: 700
#| fig-cap: "Paraboloid surface x² + y²"
#| label: fig-paraboloid
plot3d(x^2 + y^2, [x, -3, 3], [y, -3, 3]);
```

You can reference @fig-paraboloid in your text.

## Parametric 3D

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 900
#| plot_height: 700
#| fig-cap: "Parametric sphere"
#| label: fig-sphere
plot3d([cos(u)*cos(v), cos(u)*sin(v), sin(u)], [u, -%pi/2, %pi/2], [v, 0, 2*%pi]);
```

## Saddle Surface

```{maxima}
#| plot: true
#| plot_width: 900
#| plot_height: 700
plot3d(x^2 - y^2, [x, -2, 2], [y, -2, 2]);
```

Done!
